ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: The authors thank Laurence Mousson and Marie Vazeille for technical advice, Anavaj Sakuntabhai and Richard Paul for their support. We also thank Yoann Madec for helping in statistical analysis. We deeply thank IASAÚDE for providing Ae. aegypti eggs used in this study.

sec.title: Funding
sec.p: The study is funded by Fundação para a Ciência e Tecnologia (FCT) through GHTM-UID/Multi/04413/2013; a FP7 Health 2011 grant “Dengue research Framework for resisting epidemics in Europe” (DENFREE), the French Government’s Investissement d’Avenir program, Laboratoire d’Excellence “Integrative Biology of Emerging Infectious Diseases” (grant n°ANR-10-LABX-62-IBEID), and the Institut Pasteur where all experimental infection of mosquitoes has been performed. GS was funded by an FCT PhD grant (SFRH/BD/98873/2013).

sec.title: Availability of data and materials
sec.p: Data supporting the conclusions of this article are included within the article. The raw datasets used and/or analysed during this study are available from the corresponding author upon reasonable request.
